metadata.synopsis: While vacationing in Savannah, Ga., Canadian couple Vincent (Elias Koteas) and Freda (Bridget Fonda) meet retired classical musician and Canadian ex-pat Camilla (Jessica Tandy). Freda, an amateur singer, finds in Camilla a powerful source of encouragement for her creative aspirations. After a fight in which Vincent belittles Freda for what he sees as impossible musical dreams, Freda recruits Camilla to join her on a road trip back to Toronto, where they plan to attend a concert together.

reviews: Camilla is too arbitrary and disorganized for me to recommend... But there are some special moments in it.
